q1: Has Argentina been to a World Cup?
a1: Argentina have been in 17 of the 21 World Cup competitions.
q2: Have they ever won the World Cup?
a2: Yes, twice. Once in 1978 and again in 1986.
q3: Do you think that Argentina has a chance to win the World Cup in the future?
a3: Yes they can, They always have a great group of players and can always build a good team
q4: Who is the best player in Argentina right now?
a4: Messi is their best player right now, but he'll probably retire soon.
q5: how old is he right now?
